message: Mildly relevant idea here: you might wanna make a white-hat trolling group. Being a public site, there's bound to people who have nothing better to do and wanna screw around with the site, so you might as well prepare yourself for obvious things like rapidly posting and page stretching. So sorta like white-hat hacking, but for things simpler than hacking.
This is a godo place, I'll ban him
He's also been posting in https://convore.com/tech/macbookair-vs-macbookpro/ by stretching the page with longcat images.
So, how do I report somebody like this guy? http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1229269/Screen%20shot%202011-02-20%20at%209.21.22%20PM.png
Maybe you wanna set a vertical image resizing script? All you'd have to do is add a "max-height: __px; width: auto;" bit of CSS
I just deleted his account, and you're right, we should limit the max-height of images.
Sorry, didn't delete his account, deleted messages from his account
